name: Storms of Shambhala
summary: Storms of Shambhala is a mythological deck-building card game. It has an amazing combination of deck-building, city building, and strategic elements. With the ability to produce four types of resources (attack, wisdom, gold, and magic), the game allows for a huge range of creative strategies. Utilize the tiered hero and building upgrades to combo your deck's effectiveness. Gathering the shards of the magical Cintamani Stone by defeating monsters and acquiring new heroes is your key to victory!
